content.data:
[Y]Interview Desk
[W]Firmware talk with a practical wizard.
[c][m.]
[W]The pro answer stayed the same: use
[W]firmware vectors and avoid brittle
[W]hardcoded addresses.
[W]Compatibility work is not boring; it
[W]keeps software alive for decades.
[c][m.]
[G]- Call jumpblocks.
[G]- Document assumptions.
[G]- Prefer clear interfaces.
[m][m-]
[Y]PRO QUOTE
[C]Fast code is nice, portable code
[C]survives.
[c][m.]
[C]0 MAIN   [W]# HELP
